statuseffect: {Slavery} -80HP for every turn, die if you reach the end(freed if you kill enemy)

skills.name: Scythe Strike
skills.desc: Deals {pdmg:(sv:Q)} to a {target}. Can use ^{two times}, On second use, deals ^{half} of the damage

skills.name: Reaping Wind
skills.desc: {place} a wind with {projsize:3} that blows away enemies who step on it by -{4 squares backwards} and deals {mdmg:(sv:W)}

skills.name: Grave Delivery
skills.desc: ^{Teleports} to a {target} and deals {pdmg:(sv:Q)} and gains {shield:70}. Damage decreases by 30% if the target is ^{in front} of you.

skills.name: Mace Attack
skills.desc: Deals {pdmg:(sv:Q)} to a {target} and heals {heal:(sv:qheal)}, If the target has ^{mark} of {skill:022}, range increases by (fv:w_qrange) and deals additional {fdmg:(sv:w_qdamage)}

skills.name: Tanut
skills.desc: Leaves a ^{mark} to a {target} and applies {effect:1601}.

skills.name: Strengthen
skills.desc: {passive}: ^{Attack and magic resistance} +{increases by 0~60} based on your {missinghp}. {active}:^{Attack and magic resistance} +{increases by (sv:r_resistance)}, gains {shield:(sv:rshield)} and {effect:0101}. Also heal amount of {skill:021} +{doubles} and ^{range} +{increase by 4}.

skills.name: Blind Curse
skills.desc: Deals {mdmg:(sv:Q)} to a {target} and applies {effect:1101}.

skills.name: Phantom Menace
skills.desc: {passive}: If you have {effect:1300} effect. {skill:031} deals additional (30% of target`s {missinghp}) as {mdmg: }.{active}: Gains {effect:1301}

skills.name: Poison Bomb
skills.desc: {place} poison bomb of {projsize:4}. Enemy who step on it gains {effect:0000} and takes {mdmg:(sv:R)} for every turn for 3 turns.

skills.name: Claw Strike
skills.desc: Deals {pdmg:(sv:Q)} to enemies {radius:(fv:qrange)}.(Damage decreases if there are multiple targets). You -{spend (fv:q_hp_spend)%} of {currhp}

skills.name: Regeneration
skills.desc: {passive}: +{Movement speed +1} if you are in behind of all players.{active}: Heals {heal:(sv:wheal)} every turn but gains {effect:0001} while healing.

skills.name: Burning at the Stake
skills.desc: Deals {pdmg:(sv:R)(+50% of target`s {missinghp})} to a {target}. Cooltime of {skill:043} ^{resets} if killed the enemy.

skills.name: Gunfire
skills.desc: Fires a gun and deals {pdmg:(sv:Q)} to a {target}. If the target has {effect:0200} or {effect:1800} effect, range increases by (fv:q_root_arange) and deals +{50% increased} damage

skills.name: Net Trap
skills.desc: {place} a trap of {projsize:3} that applies {effect:0201} to enemy who step on it

skills.name: Target Locked
skills.desc:
Selects a {target}, Automatically attacks the target ^{3 times} for 3 turns, dealing {pdmg:(sv:R)} each and gains {shield:80}. (Deals {fdmg:(sv:R)}for 3rd attack, can`t move while shooting)
After use, you gains {effect:1001}.

skills.name: Chain Lightning
skills.desc: Deals {mdmg:(sv:Q)} to all players {radius:front (fv:qrange_start)~(fv:qrange_end_front) and back (fv:qrange_start)~(fv:qrange_end_back)}

skills.name: Burning Spellbook
skills.desc: Gain {effect:1801} and {shield:50}. ^{Range} of {skill:061} and {skill:063} +{doubles}. Also {skill:061} applies {effect:1202} which damages targets by (sv:W)% of {maxhp} as {fdmg: } for every player turns.

skills.name: Dark Magic Circle
skills.desc: {place} magic circle of {projsize:3} that deals {mdmg:(sv:R)} and applies {effect:0301} to enemy who step on it. Can use ^{3 times}.

skills.name: Tenacle Strike
skills.desc: {place} a tenacle of {projsize:2} which deals {mdmg:(sv:Q)} to enemy who step on it

skills.name: Protective Water
skills.desc: Gains {shield:(sv:wshield)} and deals {mdmg:(sv:W)} and applies {effect:0001} to enemies {radius:3}.

skills.name: Predation
skills.desc: Deals {fdmg:(sv:R)} to {target}. Your  {maxhp} +{increases by 50} if you killed the target.

skills.name: Beak Attack
skills.desc: Deals {mdmg:(sv:Q)} to a {target} and take away {money:(fv:q_money)}

skills.name: Baby Birds
skills.desc: Gains {effect:0101}. {basicattack} deals additional {mdmg:(sv:w_aa_adamage)}, {skill:081} deals additional {mdmg:(sv:w_q_adamage)} and applies {effect:1801}

skills.name: Phenix Transform
skills.desc: Gains {shield:70}. ^{Basic attack range} +{+2}, {basicattack} deals additional {pdmg:(sv:r_aa_adamage)}. Additional damage of {skill:082} +{doubles} and {skill:081} creates an area of {projsize:3}. If enemy step on it, they receive {effect:1202}

skills.name: Sweet Fruit
skills.desc: {passive}: If HP is -{lower than (fv:wither_cond)%}, transforms to ^{Withered Tree}, On ^{Withered Tree} state, you can`t heal ally with {skill:091}, but ^{damage absorbtion} +{(fv:wither_absorb)% increases}. {active}: {area:(fv:qsize)}. Deals {mdmg:(sv:Q)} to enemies inside. For allies, heals {heal:(sv:qheal)} and gains {shield:(sv:qshield)}.

skills.name: Vine Trap
skills.desc: {place} a vine of {projsize:1} that ^{stops} player who passse it. Allies will gain {effect:0101}

skills.name: Root Prison
skills.desc:
{passive}: Summons ^{Plant monster} on every skill use. They deal {mdmg:(sv:plantdamage)} to enemies {radius:1} when you perform basic attack.
- Plants live for 3 turns and enemy basic attack will kill them, {active}: Deals {mdmg:(sv:R)} to {target} and applies {effect:1801} (2 turns if if you are ^{Withered Tree} state), and increases all incoming damage by +{20%}. Also, all ^{plant monsters} moves toward target.

skills.name: Vulnerability Attack
skills.desc:
Deals {pdmg:(sv:Q)(+(fv:stack_damage) x total stacks)} to a {target}, steals {money:((fv:q_money) x stacks)}, and gains a ^{'vulnerability' stack} for that target player. Damage towards the target increases permanently with ^{total vulnerability stacks}
{skillvalue:stacks}

skills.name: Remote Control
skills.desc: {passive}: {basicattack} deals additial {mdmg:(sv:W)}.{active}:Select a {target} and forcibly moves ^{2+(1 for 3 vulnerability stacks)squares} backwards and applies {effect:1601}.

skills.name: Extraction
skills.desc: ^{Imitates} ultimate(lv3 skill) of {target} and steals ^{((fv:r_steal_base)+total stacks x (fv:r_steal) )%} of targets ^{attack power and magic power} for 2 turns. Reusing this skill will use the imitated skill.

triallabel.name: Slavery
triallabel.desc: Slavery effect(dies if you reach the end)

triallabel.name: Thanos
triallabel.desc: 50% chance of death for every player

stat_detail.ultHaste: ultimate Haste applies up to 3 turns
stat_detail.basicAttackSpeed:
Damage of each basic attack decreases based on attack speed
(total damage will still increase)
stat_detail.adStat: Adaptative Stat applies to higher one between attack and magic power

item.name: Epic Fruit

item.name: Guardian Angel
item.unique_effect: revive when dies with 50% HP

item.name: Power of Mother Nature
item.unique_effect: 30% skill damage reduction, movement speed +1 for 1 turn afterwards.

item.name: Power of Nature
item.unique_effect: 10% skill damage reduction

item.name: Card of Deception
item.unique_effect: Hitting skill to enemies in front of you slows them, deals 10% more damage, then grants you speed

item.name: Ancient Spear
item.unique_effect: Skill attack deals bonus magic damage equal to 10%(5% for basic attack) of target`s maximum HP

item.name: Piercing Spear
item.unique_effect: Skill attack deals bonus magic damage equal to 5%(2% for basic attack) of target`s maximum HP

item.name: Boots
item.unique_effect: dice number +1 when fell behind

item.name: Boots of Haste
item.unique_effect: Ignores slow effect, dice number +1 when fell behind

item.name: Crossbow of Piercing
item.unique_effect: 40% armor and magic penetration. Skill attack deals bonus fixed damage equal to 7%(4% for basic attack) of target`s maximum HP

item.name: Full Diamond Armour
item.unique_effect: Max Hp increases by 10 permanently on every attack

item.name: Invisibility Cloak
item.unique_effect: Become invisible for 1 turn if HP is below 30%

item.name: Fortitude Shieldsword
item.unique_effect: If HP goes below 30%, gain shield based on attack power for 2 turns and absorb increases 30%

item.name: Boots of Preservation
item.unique_effect: Reduces incoming basic attack damage by 35%

item.name: Boots of Endurance
item.unique_effect: Reduces damage from constant damages(poison,ignite,etc) by 25%

item.name: Time Warp Potion
item.unique_effect: When AP is higher than 200, Normal skill cooltime resets if you kill an enemy

item.name: Charged Dagger
item.unique_effect: Moving by dice generates stacks. Next attack deals additional magic damage based on stacks

item.name: Thunderbolt Staff
item.unique_effect: Moving by dice generates stacks. Next skill attack deals additional magic damage based on stacks

item.name: Energized Flail of Reach
item.unique_effect: Moving by dice generates stacks. Next basic attack range increases and deals additional magic damage based on stacks

item.name: Trinity Force
item.unique_effect: Attacking enemy generate stacks. If there are 2+ stacks on turn start, movement speed +1.
